title: [UWP] Capture WebView http request
body:

comments.body: How about adding a new navigation method, NavigateWithHttpClient.  Then developers could at least create custom IHttpFilters so we could inject some custom behavior into the Http pipeline.
Has there been any update on this? As rightly mentioned by the poster of this question, Android and iOS have straight-forward methods to do this.
Have you found a way to capture POST requests and return your own data to the caller?
There is a way to at least capture cookies for WebView.
Yes, it's important for hybrid apps.
